title: Laugh and lie dovvne: or, The worldes folly
author: Tourneur, Cyril, 1575?-1626.
publisher: [By William Jaggard] for Ieffrey Chorlton, and are to be sold at his shop, at the great north dore of saint Paules,
notes: Dedication signed: C.T., i.e. Cyril Tourneur.
Running title reads: The vvorlds folly.
Identified as STC 15316a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
